attributes.additional_details:
WIth asll the recent riot activity it is clear that we have in the UK a large number of adolescent people with far too much time on their hands. They also have no jobs, no respect for others, no respect for society and worst of all no respect for themselves.
A good couple of years serving their country with good solid training will help them get back some of that they have lost.
Sign this petition and let's get order and self respect back on the agenda.
